Data Science (DATASCI)~Research Design and Applications for Data and Analysis~W201~Master of Information and Data Science students only~3

Data Science (DATASCI)~Statistics for Data Science~W203~Master of Information and Data Science students only. Intermediate competency in calculus is required. A college-level linear algebra course is recommended~3

Intermediate competency in Python, C, or Java, and competency in Linux, GitHub, and relevant Python libraries; or permission of instructor. Knowledge of database management including SQL is recommended but not required~3

Data Science (DATASCI)~Applied Machine Learning~W207~Master of Information and Data Science students only. Data Science W201, W203. Intermediate competency in Python, C, or Java, and competency in Linux, GitHub, and relevant Python libraries; or permission of instructor. Linear algebra is recommended~3

Data Science (DATASCI)~Data Visualization and Communication~W209~Master of Information and Data Science students only. DATASCI W203. Students must take DATASCI W205 concurrently or prior to DATASCI W209. If taken concurrently, students may not drop W205 and remain in W209~3

Data Science (DATASCI)~Capstone~W210~Master of Information and Data Science Students only.
Students must have completed (or are completing during the same semester) all core courses (Data Science W201, W203, W205, W207 and W209)~3
Data Science (DATASCI)~Behind the Data: Humans and Values~W231~MIDS and MPA students only~3
Data Science (DATASCI)~Experiments and Causal Inference~W241~Data Science W201 and W203~3

Data Science (DATASCI)~Scaling Up! Really Big Data~W251~Master of Information and Data Science students only. Students must have completed Data Science W201, W203, and W205 before enrolling in this course. They should be able to program in C, Python, or Java and/or be able to pick up a new programming language quickly. A degree of fluency is expected with the basics of operating systems (e.g., Linux and the Internet Technologies~3

Data Science (DATASCI)~Machine Learning at Scale~W261~Master of Information and Data Science students only.

Data Science (DATASCI)~Natural Language Processing~W266~Master of Information and Data Science students only. Data Science W207~3
